titles.title: PREPARE Act of 2015
Prepare, Ready, Equip, and Prevent Areas at Risk of Emergency Wildfires Act of 2015
A bill to amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to provide for wildfire mitigation grants and financial assistance in certain areas affected by wildfires.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
